message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but $150 is a bit too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I can only offer $80 at this time.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $125.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $125 is still out of my price range. Let's try $90. I'm serious about buying, but I need to stay within my budget.
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I can offer it to you for $115, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
Alice, I'm getting closer to your price, but $115 is still too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $100, but that's my final offer.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $110, Bob. I think it's a fair price considering the value the product brings. Let me know if you're willing to meet me at $110.
